import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';// Asegúrate de importar Link si lo estás usando
import{DUMMY_POSTS}from'../data';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[posts]=useState(DUMMY_POSTS);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"dashboard",children:posts.length?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container dashboard__container",children:posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"dashboard__post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard__post-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dashboard__post-thumbnail",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:post.thumbnail,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:post.title})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard__post-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/posts/${post.id}`,className:"btn sm",children:"View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/posts/${post.id}/edit`,className:"btn sm primary",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/posts/${post.id}/delete`,className:"btn sm danger",children:"Delete"})]})]},post.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"center",children:"You have no posts yet."})});};export default Dashboard;
